issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

components.name: Titanium SDK & CLI
components.description: Please enter tickets related to the MobileSDK here.

fields.description: When setting width or height to a LeftView (haven't tried RightView, but I suppose it's the same) nothing happens.
fields.summary: Android: width and height properties don't work for side views of Ti.UI.Android.DrawerLayout

comments.body: Hello, First, we need a sample reproducible code that we can use to test the issue. The code need to be only convering the issue behavior. Also, we need the testing platform info like CLI, And Android version (simulator, device). Please provide the follow info. Thanks.
Ok there was no problem at all. I didn't knew leftWidth and rightWidth properties did exist for DrawerLayout. I was using the normal width property on the side view.
[~gfigueras], Thanks for your feedback. As there is no issue, we are going to close the ticket.
